file.original: Exercise Add Extra Usage from Counters to Invoices.htm

external-file.href: Exercise Add Extra Usage from Counters to Invoices.htm.skl

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Add Extra Usage from Counters to Invoices

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Add Extra Usage from Counters to Invoices

trans-unit.source: Item R-10000-02, ReTex TC240 LC Crawler Excavator, is now equipped with a counter for Operation Hours. Based on a monthly invoice period, 160 hours are included in the rental price of 1500. If this number of hours has been exceeded upon return of the item, the extra usage will be added to the invoice at a price of 9.38 per hour (Rate Price / Free Operation Hours).

seg-source.mrk: Item R-10000-02, ReTex TC240 LC Crawler Excavator, is now equipped with a counter for Operation Hours.
Based on a monthly invoice period, 160 hours are included in the rental price of 1500.
If this number of hours has been exceeded upon return of the item, the extra usage will be added to the invoice at a price of 9.38 per hour (Rate Price / Free Operation Hours).

trans-unit.source: Customer R-10000 needs to rent item R-10000-02 for the entire month of January 2019. Upon shipment, the hourly counter in the Stock Movement shipment is updated to 10 to match the counter on the item. When the item is returned on January 31st, the counter is checked and 195 is entered in the Stock Movement return. Since the number of hours was exceeded by 25 (return counter - shipment counter - free operation hours (195-10-160)), an entry for extra hours is added to the invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Customer R-10000 needs to rent item R-10000-02 for the entire month of January 2019.
Upon shipment, the hourly counter in the Stock Movement shipment is updated to 10 to match the counter on the item.
When the item is returned on January 31st, the counter is checked and 195 is entered in the Stock Movement return.
Since the number of hours was exceeded by 25 (return counter - shipment counter - free operation hours (195-10-160)), an entry for extra hours is added to the invoice.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The same process can be performed for miles counters using the Free Operation Miles in Rental Prices and Operation Miles in Stock Movements.

seg-source.mrk: The same process can be performed for miles counters using the Free Operation Miles in Rental Prices and Operation Miles in Stock Movements.

trans-unit.source: Set Up the Price Structure

seg-source.mrk: Set Up the Price Structure

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to set up the price structure:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to set up the price structure:

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the work date is 01/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that the work date is 01/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Contract Management > Items.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Contract Management > Items.

trans-unit.source: Locate item R-10000-02 and then click Navigate > Prices (in the Rental group).

seg-source.mrk: Locate item R-10000-02 and then click Navigate > Prices (in the Rental group).

trans-unit.source:
In the Rental Prices page, enter the following:
  1. Sales Type = All Customers
  2. Unit of Measure Code = PCS
  3. Rental Rate Code = MONTH
  4. Unit Price = 1500
  5. Free Operation Hours = 160
  6. Include Counters = Yes

seg-source.mrk: In the Rental Prices page, enter the following:
• Sales Type = All Customers
• Unit of Measure Code = PCS
• Rental Rate Code = MONTH
• Unit Price = 1500
• Free Operation Hours = 160
• Include Counters = Yes

trans-unit.source: : Rental Prices for item R-10000-02

seg-source.mrk: : Rental Prices for item R-10000-02

trans-unit.source: Create the Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: Create the Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the rent order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the rent order:

trans-unit.source: Insert a new rent order for customer R-10000.

seg-source.mrk: Insert a new rent order for customer R-10000.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
  1. Type = Item
  2. No. = R-10000-02
  3. Quantity = 1
  4. Rental Rate Code = Month
  5. Invoice Period = Month
  6. Rental Start Date = 01/01/19
  7. Rental End Date = 01/31/19

seg-source.mrk: On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
• Type = Item
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">No.
• Quantity = 1
• Rental Rate Code = Month
• Invoice Period = Month
• Rental Start Date = 01/01/19
• Rental End Date = 01/31/19

trans-unit.source: Notice that the Include Counters check box is selected on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the Include Counters check box is selected on the line.

trans-unit.source: : Rent Order with item that includes hourly counters in invoice

seg-source.mrk: : Rent Order with item that includes hourly counters in invoice

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: With the Shipment option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Shipment option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Select Entries.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Select Entries.

trans-unit.source: Note which serial number is selected and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Note which serial number is selected and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the line for the Insurance rate component, enter 150 in the Rate Unit Cost field.

seg-source.mrk: On the line for the Insurance rate component, enter 150 in the Rate Unit Cost field.

trans-unit.source: On the line for the Cleaning rate component, enter 50 in the Unit Price Excl. VAT field.

seg-source.mrk: On the line for the Cleaning rate component, enter 50 in the <span class="Bold">Unit Price Excl.
VAT field.

trans-unit.source: Update Counter for Shipment

seg-source.mrk: Update Counter for Shipment

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to manually update the counter prior to posting the shipment:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to manually update the counter prior to posting the shipment:

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
With the Ship option selected, click OK.
A message appears stating that lines are using counter based invoicing, should the current counter be used as the default? Clicking Yes uses the current setting in the Machine Card; clicking No allows for a manual update of the counter in the Stock Movement.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.
A message appears stating that lines are using counter based invoicing, should the current counter be used as the default?
Clicking Yes uses the current setting in the Machine Card; clicking No allows for a manual update of the counter in the Stock Movement.

trans-unit.source: Click No to update the counter manually and close the message.

seg-source.mrk: Click No to update the counter manually and close the message.

trans-unit.source: : Counter based invoicing message on shipment

seg-source.mrk: : Counter based invoicing message on shipment

trans-unit.source: Another message appears asking to update the counters before posting.

seg-source.mrk: Another message appears asking to update the counters before posting.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Stock Movement > Shipments.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Stock Movement > Shipments.

trans-unit.source: In the Rental Shipments page, locate the correct rental order and then click Update Counter.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rental Shipments page, locate the correct rental order and then click Update Counter.

trans-unit.source: : Preparing to update counter for item R-10000-02 shipment

seg-source.mrk: : Preparing to update counter for item R-10000-02 shipment

trans-unit.source: In the Counter Input page, enter 10 in the Operation Hours field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Counter Input page, enter 10 in the Operation Hours field.

trans-unit.source: : Hourly counter updated manually prior to shipment

seg-source.mrk: : Hourly counter updated manually prior to shipment

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Counter Input page and then the Rental Shipments page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Counter Input page and then the Rental Shipments page.

trans-unit.source: In the Rent Order, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rent Order, click Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: Process the Return

seg-source.mrk: Process the Return

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to process the return:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to process the return:

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 01/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 01/31/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, enter 01/31/19 in the Rental Return Date field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter 01/31/19 in the Rental Return Date field.

trans-unit.source: In the Return Qty. to Receive field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Return Qty.
to Receive field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the noted serial number is selected and then click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that the noted serial number is selected and then click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Receive option and then click OK.
A message appears stating that lines are using counter based invoicing and update the counters before posting.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.
A message appears stating that lines are using counter based invoicing and update the counters before posting.

trans-unit.source: : Message to update counters before return posting

seg-source.mrk: : Message to update counters before return posting

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Stock Movement > Return Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|rental > Stock Movement > Return Orders.

trans-unit.source: In the Rental Returns page, locate the correct rental order and then click Update Counter.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rental Returns page, locate the correct rental order and then click Update Counter.

trans-unit.source: : Preparing to update counter for item R-10000-02 return

seg-source.mrk: : Preparing to update counter for item R-10000-02 return

trans-unit.source: In the Counter Input page, enter 195 in the Operation Hours field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Counter Input page, enter 195 in the Operation Hours field.

trans-unit.source: : Hourly counter updated manually prior to shipment

seg-source.mrk: : Hourly counter updated manually prior to shipment

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Counter Input page and then the Rental Returns page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Counter Input page and then the Rental Returns page.

trans-unit.source: In the Rent Order, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rent Order, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Process the Invoice

seg-source.mrk: Process the Invoice

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to process the invoice:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to process the invoice:

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Click the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 01/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 01/31/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 01/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 01/31/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to create the invoice and then accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to create the invoice and then accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Invoices.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Invoices.

trans-unit.source: Open the invoice and notice that a line has been added for the extra usage of 25 hours in the amount of 234.38, which is calculated at the Hourly Rental Rate of 9.38 (25 * 9.38).

seg-source.mrk: Open the invoice and notice that a line has been added for the extra usage of 25 hours in the amount of 234.38, which is calculated at the Hourly Rental Rate of 9.38 (25 * 9.38).

trans-unit.source: : Invoice with extra hourly usage from counters

seg-source.mrk: : Invoice with extra hourly usage from counters

trans-unit.source: Post the invoice and then close the Rent Order.

seg-source.mrk: Post the invoice and then close the Rent Order.

trans-unit.source: Review Updated Counter Information on Machine Card

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to view the update counter information on the Machine Card:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Machines, click Machines > Machines.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Machines, click Machines > Machines.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the line for item R-10000-02 with the serial number used in this exercise.

seg-source.mrk: Double-click the line for item R-10000-02 with the serial number used in this exercise.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Technical Data FastTab and notice that the Operation Hours field is updated to 195, which was the hourly counter entered in the Stock Movement on return of this item.
